item.title: ‘And Just Like That’ Ending With Season 3
item.description: The ‘Sex and the City’ revival series will air its final episode on Aug. 14, which Michael Patrick King calls “a wonderful place to stop.”

item.title: HBO Max to Stream Original U.K. ‘The Office,’ ‘Luther’ and More Under BritBox Promo Pact
item.description: HBO Max is crossing the Pond in a new promotional pact with BritBox, the streamer specializing in U.K. TV dramas, comedies and murder mysteries. From Aug. 1 through Sept. 29, HBO Max in the U.S. will

item.title: U.K. ‘Office,’ ‘Luther’ Set for HBO Max Runs in Deal With BritBox
item.description: About 15 series from the BBC Studios-owned outlet will stream on HBO Max as part of a ‘pop-up’ agreement.

item.title: Peacemaker S2 trailer finds our anti-hero in a parallel world
item.description: “I don’t want to be a joke anymore. I want to be a real hero.”

item.title: HBO Max Hires ITV’s Sasha Breslau and Amazon’s Alessandro Volpato to Lead Acquisitions in U.K., Italy
item.description: The appointments come as HBO Max prepares to roll out in the key European markets next year.

item.title: Emmys: HBO and Max Score Most Nominations, Apple Takes a Big Bite
item.description: With a lot of help from ’The Penguin’ and ‘The White Lotus,’ HBO and its sibling streamer earned a record high number of nods for the two platforms.
